Description.Chinese: 中立贸易者存储量从150t提升至300t。AI玩家购买量从50吨增加到200吨。
Description.English: Increases the max storage amount of goods of AI merchants from 150t to 300t. Increases the max buying amount from AI players from 50t to 200t.
Description.French: Increases the max storage amount of goods of AI merchants from 150t to 300t. Increases the max buying amount from AI players from 50t to 200t.
Description.German: Erhöht die maximale Lagerkapazität für Waren bei den KI Händlern von 150t auf 300t. Erhöht die maximale Menge an Waren die KI Mitspieler ankaufen von 50t auf 200t.
Description.Italian: Increases the max storage amount of goods of AI merchants from 150t to 300t. Increases the max buying amount from AI players from 50t to 200t.
